author: Liah
text: If you want to be in my life, love all that I am ... Not just the good ... But most importantly, the bad. If you're not up for the challenge, just walk away. I am looking for a Man who can handle me, not a child who needs babysitting! 😏😏

author: Liah
text: I am the person he needs .. but not the person he loves 😔😔💔💔

author: Liah
text: One thing I learned from my past relationships is you can never compare one from the other. People are different so people love differently. You just have to trust that they love you the best way they know how and be thankful by loving them back the best way you can!

author: Liah
text: When will you need me the same way I need you? 😔😔

author: Liah
text: How can I make you understand that you're all that I want? 😔😔

author: Liah
text: I want to go back to the time when I haven't met you 😞😔

author: Liah
text: Moving on is taking everything that reminds you of him and placing it all in a box. The heavier the box becomes the lighter you feel.

author: Liah
text: You said you needed a little time for my mistakes.  It's funny how you used that time to have me replaced.

author: Liah
text: there are days when you might feel that I don't remember you. I'm not texting you, not even calling you. What you dont know is, all those times, I was the one waiting for you to remember me! 😔💔

author: Liah
text: How many times do you have to hurt me before you tell yourself "It's Enough!"?

author: Liah
text: When trust is broken, even the truth is a lie!

author: Liah
text: Sometimes LETTING GO is better than HOLDING ON https://t.co/t6ek7oi8Vu

author: Liah
text:
Who wouldn't fall in love with this handsome fur baby ♥️♥️

author: Liah
text: The more you hurt me less pain I feel ☺️☺️ https://t.co/CLyPAbpsZo

author: Liah
text: I fall more and more in love with you with each passing day https://t.co/2Dzgr1T3iW

author: Liah
text: The more you hurt me the less pain i feel

author: Liah
text: Love without sacrifices and pain is NOT Love. So embrace the sacrifices and the pain. Because if you do, you're embracing LOVE 😊😊
